name: Aamir Khan
text:
#worldmentalhealthweek2019 Sudden, lose of job or money can cause intense fear & shame.Unmute Ur feelings & unlock Ur mind.Let shame, fear & sadness find compassionate ears in close friends & family.Healing begins when feelings r tabled.Intense pain, seek help.
STAY ALIVE!

If Raj Kapoor was an institution in film making,  Krishnaji was an institution in living life.

We love you Krishnaji.
